response.original_title: here to stay. Rassismus in Wien
response.overview: Black Lives Matter – all over the globe. And in Austria, too. It's so much easier to spit across the ocean than to sweep outside their own front door. A decade ago a group of activists and I tried to show how racism is rooted in ignorance and turning a blind eye on obvious signs like racist graffiti in a documentary centered in Vienna – that is current as never before. It features a wide spectrum, from Seibane Wague to Heinz-Christian Strache.
response.title: here to stay. Rassismus in Wien
